verbs.description: The world [V: was] losing a " great opportunity for lasting peace and great prosperity and wealth , " Trump said .
[ARG0: The world] was [V: losing] [ARG1: a " great opportunity for lasting peace and great prosperity and wealth] , " Trump said .
The world was losing a " great opportunity for [V: lasting] [ARG1: peace and great prosperity and wealth] , " Trump said .
[ARG1: The world was losing a " great opportunity for lasting peace and great prosperity and wealth] , " [ARG0: Trump] [V: said] .
